response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $1,150,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its worth and my desire to make this transaction happen. Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents an excellent chance to secure a valuable possession at a price that is highly competitive yet still reflects its true value. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
